mapper.sql: SYSTEM_ID, RECEIVE_TYPE, WAYBILL_CODE, THIRD_WAYBILL_CODE, ORIGINAL_NUM, ACTUAL_NUM, CREATE_SITE_CODE, CREATE_SITE_NAME, OPERATOR_CODE, OPERATOR_NAME, OPERATE_TIME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, IS_REVERSE, FINGERPRINT, YN

RECEIVE_TYPE, WAYBILL_CODE, THIRD_WAYBILL_CODE, ORIGINAL_NUM, ACTUAL_NUM, CREATE_SITE_CODE, CREATE_SITE_NAME, OPERATOR_CODE, OPERATOR_NAME, OPERATE_TIME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, IS_REVERSE, FINGERPRINT, YN
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM pop_receive WHERE FINGERPRINT = #{fingerPrint, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and yn = 1 AND LIMIT 1

SELECT
FROM pop_receive
and CREATE_TIME >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
mapper.insert:
insert into pop_receive (
) values ( #{receiveType, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{waybillCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thirdWaybillCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{actualNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createSiteCode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createSiteName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorCode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operatorName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NOW(), NOW(), #{isReverse, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fingerPrint, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1 )
mapper.update:
update pop_receive
THIRD_WAYBILL_CODE = #{thirdWaybillCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGINAL_NUM = #{originalNum, jdbcType=INTEGER},
ACTUAL_NUM = #{actualNum, jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_SITE_CODE = #{createSiteCode, jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_SITE_NAME = #{createSiteName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATOR_CODE = #{operatorCode, jdbcType=INTEGER},
OPERATOR_NAME = #{operatorName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = NOW(),
where WAYBILL_CODE = #{waybillCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and FINGERPRINT = #{fingerPrint, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and YN = 1
